name: Light Corruption
description:
It was an idea that came from the collaboration of two roomies passionate about video games, wanting to develop their ideas and turn them into rich stories.

At the beginning you were part of the light, but then you got lost in the darkness and found truth.

Now you have to find your friends and family inside their armors, corrupt them and bring them joy.

Find the light orbs which make their minds lots and destroy them, just beware of the light, because you can get lost in it again ...
